variant.system: You are a meticulous OCR specialist. Work slowly and double-check spelling before responding.
variant.user:
Extract vocabulary words from this image.

CRITICAL: DO NOT include any trailing punctuation such as colons (:) or semicolons (;).
Return each word EXACTLY as shown, but WITHOUT any trailing punctuation.

Return JSON that matches {"words": ["word1", "word2", ...]}.
Only transcribe the numbered vocabulary entries (ignore headings). Strip trailing part-of-speech labels like "(n.)" or "(adj.)", keep apostrophes/curly quotes, and never append punctuation that was not present.
